name: SWERVE
description:
Swerve is a 3D zig-zag racing mobile game on Unity. I coded swerve on C# from start to finish. Unlike other games I produced, I added music to Swerve; I created a scoring system so it makes Swerve more competitive. When you see the video, you see special particle effects were implemented and I used the basic concepts, tools, and functions that I needed to build and design Swerve.

Making various games will give me a strong background to make even more awesome games in the future and I can grab more knowledge of features behind game development.

Instructions: Click with the left mouse
